author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

* Got rid of `Wunused-result` (from call to `c_str()`)
* Since C-string `&(temp[0])` is not guaranteed by C++ standard to be null-terminated (but, I think, GCC's implementation kind of guarantees this), copy string template into a vector, explicitly add `\0` and pass it to `mkstemp`. Only `c_str()` is guaranteed to return null-terminated string, but writing to the character array accessed through `c_str()` is undefined behavior.
* Replaced call to `getcwd` with C++17 filesystem API

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: Update RemoteFile::local
